# RecipeCam - Fuji Film Recipe Camera App

React Native Expo mobile camera app with Fuji film recipe filters.

## Project Type
- React Native with Expo
- TypeScript
- Cross-platform (Android & iOS)

## Key Features
- Camera with film recipe filters
- Fuji film simulations (Velvia, Provia, Classic Chrome, etc.)
- Recipe library
- Photo gallery
- Modern UI with animations
